name: Ubiquiti Dream Router
image_prompt: Ubiquiti Dream Router, white cylindrical design, minimalist aesthetic, LED status indicator
description: All-in-one WiFi 6 router with built-in UniFi OS Console. Features dual-band AX3000, advanced network management, IDS/IPS, and support for up to 60 devices. Perfect for prosumer setups.

reviews.review_text: Enterprise-grade features at consumer price. UniFi dashboard is amazing.
Finally replaced my mesh setup. Much more reliable.
Learning curve for UniFi but worth it.
